question: In a shunt-tee, the axis of the side-arm is in

answers.a: The plane of E-field of main waveguide
answers.b: The plane of H-field of main waveguide
answers.c: A plane normal to the H-field of the main waveguide

answers.a: All the three arms lie in the plane of electric field
answers.b: All the three arms lie in the plane of magnetic field
answers.c: All the three arms lie in a plane perpendicular to magnetic field

question: What type of waveguide is widely used?
At microwave frequency waveguide becomes inefficient as result of skin effect and dielectric loss.
